You've learned those tidbits of magic that are most conducive to furthering your acquisition and transmission of knowledge. You gain [_guidance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=142), [_message_](/Spells.aspx?ID=190), and [_sigil_](/Spells.aspx?ID=286) as innate occult cantrips.
